title: @Riot I accidentally disenchanted my Death Sworn Ward skin
body:
I'm sad I worked for that ward skin all day, and i thought i was unlocking it, but I accidentally disenchanted. Can you help me?  
{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: Looks like someone got that reversed for ya already ^_^!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ugb24m2A,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-10-29T21:38:28.583+0000)
>
> Looks like someone got that reversed for ya already ^_^!

Yay! Thank you!, and thank you Riot Support member "Hidden Ki" 
{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
Same... I accidentally disenchanted my Academy Darius skin a while back REEEEE
Feels bad man. Not sure if they can help you, but lets hope they can.
